topic.title: Tor bug?
topic.body:
https://imgur.com/a/V9Lh3HZ
Does anyone know why is this happening with tor browser after the update?
Do you have a solution for this?
Edit: Sorry I didn't specify the problem. Pages don't fill the window of the browser, there's a white frame around it. It happens on any page

1573600133_1G1TDPTXcSqZFi6eyZc4ccMeiLERL.body:
> [merithtk](#comment_94_14g2gXnsZdEPShFJkGdh5W3eGXmKzqW6F8): probably tor trying to make it clear that its a form of iframe.  Maybe look around in the Tor Browser docs?

I'll take a look, the preferences page and the about:config are unaffected

> [nofish](#comment_1290_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): It's because by using javascript or css you can get the browser width so by using less-unique (fixed steps) width it makes it harder to identify the same user.

It's happening on any website and it's very annoying
